text: From #Vaccine Nationalism to Vaccine Equity https://t.co/1xOG3HrhVw 10 rich nations aim to unnecessarily vaccinate their whole populations while 130 do not see a vaccine for their risk groups. If this is not the stuff that causes uprise and even war, what then? @WEF @WHO #covid19 https://t.co/2mRzOoKzoV
